025/**
026 * Demonstrates the use of the Field of View and Line of Sight algorithms.
027 *
028 * @author Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
029 */
030public class FieldOfViewDemo {
031
032    private SquidPanel display, back;
033    private JFrame frame;
034    private static final String[] DEFAULT_MAP = new String[]{
035        "øøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøø########################################øøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøøø",

080    private DemoCell[][] map;
081    private double[][] incomingLight;
082    private SColor[][] lighting, playerLight;
083    private double[][] resistances;
084    private boolean[][] clean, lightSource, visible;
085    private double[][] visbilityMap;
086    private int width = DEFAULT_MAP[0].length(), height = DEFAULT_MAP.length;
087    private int cellWidth, cellHeight, locx, locy;
088    private LOS los;
089    private SColor litNear, litFar;
090    private int lightForce; //controls how far the light will spread
091    private FOVDemoPanel panel;
092
093    public static void main(String... args) {
094        try {
095            for (javax.swing.UIManager.LookAndFeelInfo info : javax.swing.UIManager.getInstalledLookAndFeels()) {
096                if ("Nimbus".equals(info.getName())) {
097                    javax.swing.UIManager.setLookAndFeel(info.getClassName());
098                    break;
099                }
100            }
101        } catch (ClassNotFoundException | InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException | javax.swing.UnsupportedLookAndFeelException ex) {
102        }
103        new FieldOfViewDemo();
104    }
105
106    private FieldOfViewDemo() {
107        map = new DemoCell[width][height];
108        resistances = new double[width][height];
109        lighting = new SColor[width][height];
110        playerLight = new SColor[width][height];
111        clean = new boolean[width][height];
112        lightSource = new boolean[width][height];
113        visible = new boolean[width][height];
114        visbilityMap = new double[width][height];
115        for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {
116            for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
117                char c = DEFAULT_MAP[y].charAt(x);
118                map[x][y] = buildCell(c);
119                resistances[x][y] = map[x][y].resistance;
120                lighting[x][y] = SColor.BLACK;//set to not lit
121                playerLight[x][y] = SColor.BLACK;
122            }
123        }
124
125        //put start location at middle of map
126        locx = width / 2;
127        locy = height / 2;
128
129        frame = new JFrame("SquidGrid Field of View Demonstration");
130        frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
131        frame.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
132
133        panel = new FOVDemoPanel();
134        frame.add(panel, BorderLayout.NORTH);
135
136        panel.clearBox.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
137            @Override
138            public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
139                clear();
140            }
141        });
142
143        cellWidth = 18;
144        cellHeight = 18;
145        TextCellFactory text = new TextCellFactory().font(new Font("Arial", Font.BOLD, 18)).width(cellWidth).height(cellHeight);
146        display = new SquidPanel(width, height, text, null);
147        back = new SquidPanel(width, height, text, null);
148        clear();
149
150        JLayeredPane layers = new JLayeredPane();
151        layers.setLayer(display, JLayeredPane.PALETTE_LAYER);
152        layers.setLayer(back, JLayeredPane.DEFAULT_LAYER);
153        layers.add(display);
154        layers.add(back);
155        layers.setSize(display.getPreferredSize());
156        layers.setPreferredSize(display.getPreferredSize());
157        layers.setMinimumSize(display.getPreferredSize());
158        frame.add(layers, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
159
160        frame.getContentPane().setBackground(SColor.BLACK);
161        frame.setVisible(true);
162
163        frame.pack();
164        frame.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
165        frame.repaint();
166
167        DemoInputListener dil = new DemoInputListener();
168        MouseInputListener mil = new SquidMouse(cellWidth, cellHeight, dil);
169        display.addMouseListener(mil);//listens for clicks and releases
170        display.addMouseMotionListener(mil);//listens for movement based events
171        frame.addKeyListener(dil);
172    }
173
174    private void clear() {
175        for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {
176            for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
177                display.put(x, y, map[x][y].representation, map[x][y].color);
178                lighting[x][y] = SColor.BLACK;
179                clean[x][y] = false;
180                lightSource[x][y] = false;
181                visible[x][y] = false;
182            }
183        }
184        back.erase();
185        display.refresh();
186    }
187
188    private void draw() {
189        for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {
190            for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
191                if (!clean[x][y]) {
192                    if (!panel.placeLightSourceBox.isSelected() && !visible[x][y]) {
193                        display.put(x, y, SColor.BLACK);
194                    } else {
195                        if (lightSource[x][y]) {
196                            display.put(x, y, '⊚', lighting[x][y]);
197                        } else {
198                            SColor color;
199                            if (panel.playerCastsLightBox.isSelected()) {
200                                color = SColorFactory.lightWith(map[x][y].color, SColorFactory.add(lighting[x][y], playerLight[x][y]));
201                            } else {
202                                color = SColorFactory.lightWith(map[x][y].color, lighting[x][y]);
203                            }
204                            display.put(x, y, map[x][y].representation, color);
205                        }
206                    }
207                    clean[x][y] = true;
208                }
209            }
210        }
211
212        //put the player at the origin of the FOV
213        if (!panel.placeLightSourceBox.isSelected()) {
214            display.put(locx, locy, '@', SColor.ALICE_BLUE);
215            clean[locx][locy] = false;
216        }
217        display.refresh();
218    }
219
220    /**
221     * Builds a cell based on the character in the map.
222     *
223     * @param c
224     * @return
225     */
226    private DemoCell buildCell(char c) {
227        float resistance = 0f;//default is transparent
228        SColor color;
229        switch (c) {
230            case '.'://stone ground
231                color = SColor.SLATE_GRAY;
232                break;
233            case '¸'://grass
234                color = SColor.GREEN;
235                break;
236            case ','://pathway
237                color = SColor.STOREROOM_BROWN;
238                c = '.';
239                break;
240            case 'c':
241                color = SColor.SEPIA;
242                break;
243            case '/':
244                color = SColor.BROWNER;
245                break;
246            case '≈':
247                color = SColor.AZUL;
248                break;
249            case '<':
250            case '>':
251                color = SColor.SLATE_GRAY;
252                break;
253            case 't':
254                color = SColor.BROWNER;
255                resistance = 0.3f;
256                break;
257            case 'm':
258                color = SColor.BAIKO_BROWN;
259                resistance = 0.1f;
260                break;
261            case 'u':
262                color = SColor.TAN;
263                resistance = 0.2f;
264                break;
265            case 'T':
266            case '₤':
267                color = SColor.FOREST_GREEN;
268                resistance = 0.7f;
269                break;
270            case 'E':
271                color = SColor.SILVER;
272                resistance = 0.8f;
273                break;
274            case 'S':
275                color = SColor.BREWED_MUSTARD_BROWN;
276                resistance = 0.9f;
277                break;
278            case '#':
279                color = SColor.SLATE_GRAY;
280                resistance = 1f;
281                break;
282            case '+':
283                color = SColor.BROWNER;
284                resistance = 1f;
285                break;
286            case 'A':
287                color = SColor.ALICE_BLUE;
288                resistance = 1f;
289                break;
290            case 'ø':
291                c = ' ';
292                color = SColor.BLACK;
293                resistance = 1f;
294                break;
295            default://opaque items
296                resistance = 1f;//unknown is opaque
297                color = SColor.DEEP_PINK;
298        }
299        return new DemoCell(resistance, c, color);
300    }
301
302    private void move(Direction dir) {
303        int x = locx + dir.deltaX;
304        int y = locy + dir.deltaY;
305
306        //check for legality of move based solely on map boundary
307        if (x >= 0 && x < width && y >= 0 && y < height) {
308            locx = x;
309            locy = y;
310            doFOV(x, y);
311        }
312    }
313
314    /**
315     * Performs the Field of View process
316     *
317     * @param startx
318     * @param starty
319     */
320    private void doFOV(int startx, int starty) {
321        lightForce = panel.radiusSlider.getValue();
322        litNear = SColorFactory.asSColor(panel.castColorPanel.getBackground().getRGB());
323        litFar = SColorFactory.asSColor(panel.fadeColorPanel.getBackground().getRGB());
324        incomingLight = panel.getFOVSolver().calculateFOV(resistances, startx, starty, lightForce, panel.getStrategy());
325        SColorFactory.addPallet("light", SColorFactory.asGradient(litNear, litFar));
326
327        if (panel.placeLightSourceBox.isSelected()) {
328            lightSource[startx][starty] = true;
329        } else {
330            visbilityMap = panel.getFOVSolver().calculateFOV(resistances, startx, starty, Math.max(width / 2, height / 2));
331            for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {
332                for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
333                    boolean wasvisible = visible[x][y];
334                    visible[x][y] = visbilityMap[x][y] > 0f;
335                    clean[x][y] = !(wasvisible || visible[x][y]);
336                }
337            }
338        }
339
340        //repaint the level with new light map
341        for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {
342            for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
343                if (panel.placeLightSourceBox.isSelected()) {
344                    if (incomingLight[x][y] > 0) {
345                        clean[x][y] = false;
346                        if (!lightSource[x][y]) {//don't add extra light to light sources
347                            double bright = 1 - incomingLight[x][y];
348                            lighting[x][y] = SColorFactory.add(lighting[x][y], SColorFactory.fromPallet("light", (float) bright));
349                        }
350                        if (x == startx && y == starty) {//light source is given it's full light
351                            lighting[x][y] = litNear;
352                        }
353                    }
354                } else {
355                    if (panel.playerCastsLightBox.isSelected()) {
356                        if (incomingLight[x][y] > 0) {
357                            double bright = 1 - incomingLight[x][y];
358                            playerLight[x][y] = SColorFactory.fromPallet("light", (float) bright);
359                            clean[x][y] = false;
360                        } else if (!playerLight[x][y].equals(SColor.BLACK)) {
361                            playerLight[x][y] = SColor.BLACK;
362                            clean[x][y] = false;
363                        }
364                    }
365                }
366            }
367        }
368
369        draw();
370    }
371
372    /**
373     * Performs the Line of Sight calculation and paints target square with a green background if it can be reached or a
374     * red if not.
375     *
376     * @param startx
377     * @param starty
378     * @param endx
379     * @param endy
380     */
381    private void doLOS(int startx, int starty, int endx, int endy) {//TODO -- figure out why this does strange things if dragged and released in same cell
382        los = panel.getLOSSolver();
383
384        //run the LOS calculation
385        boolean seen = los.isReachable(resistances, startx, starty, endx, endy);
386        Queue<Point> path = los.getLastPath();
387
388        //draw out background for path followed
389        for (Point p : path) {
390            back.put(p.x, p.y, SColorFactory.blend(SColor.BLUE_GREEN_DYE, SColor.DARK_INDIGO, panel.getStrategy().radius(startx, starty, p.x, p.y) / panel.getStrategy().radius(startx, starty, endx, endy)));
391        }
392
393        //mark the start location
394        if (startx >= 0 && startx < width && starty >= 0 && starty < height) {
395            back.put(startx, starty, SColor.AMBER_DYE);
396        }
397
398        //mark end point
399        if (endx >= 0 && endx < width && endy >= 0 && endy < height) {
400            if (seen) {
401                back.put(endx, endy, SColor.BRIGHT_GREEN);
402            } else {
403                back.put(endx, endy, SColor.RED_PIGMENT);
404            }
405            back.refresh();
406        }
407    }
408
409    /**
410     * A simple input listener.
411     */
412    private class DemoInputListener implements MouseInputListener, KeyListener {
413
414        int startx, starty;
415        boolean dragged = false;
416
417        @Override
418        public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e) {
419            dragged = false;
420            locx = e.getX();
421            locy = e.getY();
422            doFOV(e.getX(), e.getY());
423            if (!panel.placeLightSourceBox.isSelected()) {
424                for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {
425                    for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
426                        visible[x][y] = false;
427                        clean[x][y] = false;
428                    }
429                }
430                draw();
431                doFOV(locx, locy);
432            }
433            frame.requestFocusInWindow();
434        }
435
436        @Override
437        public void mousePressed(MouseEvent e) {
438            dragged = false;
439            startx = e.getX();
440            starty = e.getY();
441        }
442
443        @Override
444        public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent e) {
445            if (dragged && (startx != e.getX() || starty != e.getY())) {
446                doLOS(startx, starty, e.getX(), e.getY());
447            }
448            dragged = false;
449        }
450
451        @Override
452        public void mouseEntered(MouseEvent e) {
453            //nothing special happens
454        }
455
456        @Override
457        public void mouseExited(MouseEvent e) {
458            //nothing special happens
459        }
460
461        @Override
462        public void mouseDragged(MouseEvent e) {
463            dragged = true;
464        }
465
466        @Override
467        public void mouseMoved(MouseEvent e) {
468//            int x = e.getX();
469//            int y = e.getY();
470//            String val = String.format("%.2f", visbilityMap[x][y]);
471//            panel.tileValueField.setText(val);
472//            System.out.println("" + x + ", " + y + " : " + val);
473        }
474
475        @Override
476        public void keyTyped(KeyEvent e) {
477        }
478
479        @Override
480        public void keyPressed(KeyEvent e) {
481            int code = e.getExtendedKeyCode();
482            move(getDirection(code));
483        }
484
485        @Override
486        public void keyReleased(KeyEvent e) {
487        }
488
489        private Direction getDirection(int code) {
490            switch (code) {
491                case VK_LEFT:
492                case VK_NUMPAD4:
493                    return LEFT;
494                case VK_RIGHT:
495                case VK_NUMPAD6:
496                    return RIGHT;
497                case VK_UP:
498                case VK_NUMPAD8:
499                    return UP;
500                case VK_DOWN:
501                case VK_NUMPAD2:
502                    return DOWN;
503                case VK_NUMPAD1:
504                    return DOWN_LEFT;
505                case VK_NUMPAD3:
506                    return DOWN_RIGHT;
507                case VK_NUMPAD7:
508                    return UP_LEFT;
509                case VK_NUMPAD9:
510                    return UP_RIGHT;
511                default:
512                    return NONE;
513            }
514        }
515    }
516
517    private class DemoCell {
518
519        float resistance;
520        char representation;
521        SColor color;
522
523        /**
524         * Creates a new cell which has minimal properties needed to represent it.
525         *
526         * @param resistance
527         * @param color
528         * @param representation
529         */
530        public DemoCell(float resistance, char representation, SColor color) {
531            this.resistance = resistance;
532            this.representation = representation;
533            this.color = color;
534        }
535    }
536}
